name: ATLANTIS (itch) (yunakigames)
description:
It's our first Ludum Dare for me and my bro :).

Its was a so much exciting experience. We had fun trying pixel art style, and with Haxe/Flixel.

Here is our game, use the ancient technology of Atlantis, the use of the energy charged from the crystal.

"Defend the city of Atlantis before that the big wave overwhelm it !"

Have fun :)

Game made by:

@yben : Dev

@djam : Graphics

Using :

HaxeFlixel

Photoshop

BFXR

HaxeDevelop
